get.description: Retrieves a list of SWS policies, according to a query

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the policy

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: The free search string. Valid values: free text/patterns/wildcards

parameters.name: securityLayers
parameters.description: List of Policy Security Layers, as search criteria (at least single layer from the the list must be presented into searched policy)

parameters.name: memberTypes
parameters.description: List of Member Types, as search criteria (at least single layer from the the list must be presented into searched policy)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return

accessStartDate.description: The date (timestamp) when the vendor's access to Alero begins.

accessEndDate.description: The date (timestamp) when the vendor's access to Alero ends.

canInvite.description: Whether or not this vendor can invite other vendors.

invitedVendorsInitialStatus.description: Whether additional vendors that will be invited by this vendor accounts are activated automatically or manually by the administrator after registration.

maxNumInvitedVendors.description: The number of sub-vendors that this vendor can invite.

username.description: The Vault user in the CyberArk PAS environment for this vendor.

groups.description: Groups that the vendor belongs to.

items.description: Groups that the vendor belongs to.

comments.description: Comments about this vendor, including the purpose of this invitation.

applications.description: The id of the application and site to update, and the new values.

pvwaApplications.description: Whether or not this vendor can access Web Applications.

initialStatus.description: Whether the vendor's account will be activated automatically or manually by the administrator after registration.

accessStartDate.description: The date (milliseconds since Epoch) when the vendor's access to Alero begins.

accessEndDate.description: The date (milliseconds since Epoch) when the vendor's access to Alero ends..

canInvite.description: Whether or not this vendor can invite other vendors.

comments.description: Comments about this vendor, including the purpose of this invitation.

provisioningUsername.description:
The Vault user in the CyberArk PAS environment that will be created for this vendor.
This value is mandatory for vendors with ProvisionedByAlero/ ManagedByAdmin  provisioning Type

provisioningGroups.description:
The groups that the vendor is added to.
This parameter is mandatory when provisioningType is set to ProvisionedByAlero

items.description:
The groups that the vendor is added to.
This parameter is mandatory when provisioningType is set to ProvisionedByAlero

applications.description: A list of applications that the vendor can access through Alero.

customText.description: The name of a predefined invitation template added to the vendor invitation.

maxNumOfInvitedVendors.description:
The number of sub-vendors that this vendor can invite.
0 for unlimited

phoneAndEmailAuth.description: Whether or not this vendor will authenticate to Alero with an SMS code/phone call and a token received by email, instead of scanning the QR code with the Alero app.

invitedVendorsInitialStatus.description: Whether additional vendors that will be invited by this vendor accounts will be activated automatically or manually by the administrator after registration

companyName.description: The name of the company that the user represents as an Alero user.

emailAddress.description: The user's email address in the company they represent.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number that the user set when they registered for Alero in an international format. If 'phoneAndEmailAuth' is set to 'true' this value can include an extension. The extension number structure is: <number>X<extension, example: +9721111111X123.

initialStatus.description: Whether the vendor's account will be activated automatically or manually by the administrator after registration.
